title: Bisondesign: Our new website
content:
Please take a look at our new website:

[http://www.bisondesign.no](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014015447/http:/www.bisondesign.no/ "http://www.bisondesign.no")

A good chance to brush up your norwegian!

Alex
author: alexfjelldal

comments.content:
Ah nice, i really like your website (and content). Sprichst du noch deutsch, du hast ja in Potsdam studiert, oder? So gut ist mein norwegisch jetzt nicht :)  
T.
oh and i meant varied in style not quality :)

Ofcourse the Sex book is the best :-)

Good site!  
What does Bison mean in Norwegian? In my case, "brushing up" is not enough, I need the whole bucket with a pile of brushes :-)

ChrisL
